name: Chaos architect
description:
Chaos architect is a very small and short sandbox experience, in where you torture cubes. this is also my first game jam submission and was made in 3 days.

Black hole art is from GabrielAguiarProductions: https://www.patreon.com/GabrielAguiarProd

Music is :(7) Sandbox – Silent Partner (No Copyright Music) - YouTube
